===Proper noun===
{{zh-proper noun}}

# {{lb|zh|geography}} [[Nanshan]] {{gloss|[[various]] [[town]]s, [[district]]s, and [[subdistrict]]s of [[China]]}}
# {{lb|zh|geography}} [[Nanshan]] {{gloss|a [[dormant]] [[volcano]] in [[northeastern]] [[China]]'s [[Keluo]] [[volcanic]] [[field]]}}
# {{lb|zh|geography}} [[Namsan]] {{gloss|[[various]] [[hill]]s and [[mountain]]s of [[Korea]]}}

# {{lb|zh|geography|uncommon}} ''An alternative term for'' '''[[祁連山]]''' ''or'' '''[[祁连山]]''' (the [[Qilian]] [[mountains|Mountains]]), a [[range]] between [[Gansu]] and [[Qinghai]] [[south]] of the [[Hexi Corridor]].
# {{lb|zh|geography|uncommon}} ''An alternative term for'' '''[[終南山]]''' ''or'' '''[[终南山]]''' (the [[Zhongnan]] [[mountains|Mountains]]), a [[range]] [[south]] of [[Xi'an]] in [[Shaanxi]].
# {{lb|zh|geography|obsolete}} A [[former]] [[name]] of '''[[廬山]]''' or '''[[庐山]]''' ([[mount|Mount]] [[Lu]]) [[prior]] to the [[Song]] [[dynasty]].
